hints.content:
We start at $2{:}22$ when Saki finished washing her dog.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:00 to 2:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 2:00, 2:05, 2:10, 2:15, 2:20, 2:25, and 2:30 are labeled. A red circle appears on the  unlabeled tick mark at 2:22. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Saki started washing her dog, we go **left** ${13}$ minutes from $2{:}22$.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{2{:}22} -{} &\goldE{2}\text{ minutes} = 2{:}20\\\\
{2{:}20} -{} &\purpleD{10}\text{ minutes} = 2{:}10\\\\
2{:}10 -{} & \blueD{1}\text{ minute} = \greenD{2{:}09} 
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:00 to 2:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 2:00, 2:05, 2:10, 2:15, 2:20, 2:25, and 2:30 are labeled. A series of three arrows are shown moving right to left from the 2:22 tick mark to the 2:09 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 2:22 tick mark and ends at the 2:20 tick mark and is labeled minus 2. The second arrow starts at the 2:20 tick mark and ends at the 2:10 tick mark and is labeled minus 10. The third arrow starts at the 2:10 tick mark and ends at the 2:09 tick mark and is labeled minus 1. !

hints.content:
Saki started washing her dog $\greenD{2{:}09} $.  

Which clock shows $\greenD{2{:}09}$?

When Saki starts washing her dog, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 2 and the long hand on the fourth tick mark after 1. !

question.content:
Saki spends $13$ minutes washing her dog.  Saki finishes washing her dog at $2{:}22 \text{ p.m.}$

**What time did the clock show when Saki starts washing her dog?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the second tick mark after 4.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b0934a63122d406c79d26b93fb62373f7c388b68)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 2 and 3 and the long hand on the 7.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b743dc0cdaa95588826298f1b88cbf6e8ab9134b)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 2 and the long hand on the fourth tick mark after 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/63c1f47a6283ca8296884b44329b214cac5a4f87)
